## StorageManager.store() method

Store a JSON file locally.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
store(id: string, data: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The name of the JSON file. |
|  data | any | The JSON data that needs to be stored. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
